title: Bible (Proverbs to Apocalypse).
description: Decoration: red and blue penwork initials.
Ex libris Ronald A. Coates; Eric Millar; Brian S. Cron. From the collection of Toshiyuki Takamiya, 2013-.
With an Oxford pledge note for the Selton Loan Chest dated 1469 and the mark of the stationer John More. There is also a note by M. Paris, possibly Master Thomas Paris of Oriel College.
subjectTopic: Medieval and Renaissance Manuscripts in Beinecke Library.

references: A handlist of western Medieval manuscripts in the Takamiya collection / Toshiyuki Takamiya, in The Medieval book: glosses from friends & colleagues of Christopher de Hamel, ed. by Richard Linenthal, James Marrow and William Noel. 't Goy-Houten: Hes & De Graff, 2010, pp. 421-437.
abstract: Manuscript, on parchment, of the books of the Bible from Proverbs through the Apocalypse.
